price: Terão o que quiserem junto de seu Senhor. Essa é a recompensa dos benfeitores.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna ʿinda rabbihim dhālika jazāu al-muḥ'sinīna
